creditline: Gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
dimension: 29 x 20 in. (73.66 x 50.8 cm) (sheet, as printed)
text: This artwork is part of the series COVID-19: Labor Camp Report. Artist's statement on this artwork originally published on the @laborcamp Instagram account: I am sure our Dear Leader could use a little pickup today. So, I am extending the kind of “support” he bestows on millions of sick Americans, and hundreds of thousands who died from this disease. Remember: if you stay positive in a negative situation, you win!
title: October 2, 2020: Stay POSITIVE!
